frame.name: Product_line
frame.definition:
<def-root>A specified <fen>Designer</fen> or a <fen>Brand</fen> creates and distributes a <fen>Collection</fen> of related <fen>Products</fen>. The individual <fen>Products</fen> may all be part of a set or may just be related by season or other arbitrary reason.
<ex>The <fex name="Desc">new</fex> <fex name="Brand">Gucci</fex> <fex name="Coll"><t>line</t></fex> is due out in early Spring.</ex>
<ex>He gave her the entire <fex name="Brand">Oscar de la Renta</fex> <fex name="Desc">spring</fex><fex name="Coll"><t>collection</t></fex> for her birthday.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Brand">Clorox</fex> now <m>produces</m> a <fex name="Coll"><t>line</t></fex> <fex name="Products">of eco-friendly cleaning products</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="D">Her</fex> <fex name="Desc">new</fex> <fex name="Products">product</fex> <fex name="Coll"><t>line</t></fex> turned out to be a wild success.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Brand
FE.definition:
<def-root>The company that produces the <fen>Collection</fen> of <fen>Products</fen>.
<ex>Did you see the new <fex name="Brand">Kate Spade</fex> <t>line</t>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Collection
FE.definition:
<def-root>The set of <fen>Products</fen> produced by the <fen>Brand</fen>.
<ex>They're so damn rich, they could buy this whole <fex name="Coll"><t>line</t></fex> without batting an eyelash.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Products
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual items produced by the <fen>Brand</fen>.
<ex>Jaques just showed us his Fall <t>line</t> <fex name="Products">of cocktail dresses</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>A characteristic of the <fen>Collection</fen> or individual <fen>Products</fen>.
<ex>His <fex name="Desc">debut</fex> <t>collection</t> had brilliant crisp white shirts, beautiful eveningwear, and denim that was a little suspect.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Collection_name
FE.definition:
<def-root>The name of the <fen>Collection</fen> of <fen>Products</fen> produced by the <fen>Brand</fen>.
<ex>The Greenwich armchair from Barnsley House's <fex name="Name">Winterthur</fex> <t>collection</t> is a must for those looking for sturdy yet stylish garden furniture.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Designer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who designs the <fen>Collection</fen>.
<ex>Did you see <fex name="D">Louis'</fex> new <t>line</t>?</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: line.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a group of related products created by a company

lexUnit.name: collection.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a set of realted items produced by a company
